name: Schwalbe Marathon Winter Plus 24 x 1.75in. Wire Tire
categories: Marathon Winter Plus 24 x 1.75in. Wire Tire
description:
Retain full control on icy roads, even on tight turns and under hard braking. These studded tires make your winter rides safer, taking a little anxiety out of your commute. The spikes work best on ice when running at minimum pressure. At maximum pressure, you can ride these tires on ice-free roads with minimal noise.5mm SmartGuard for puncture resistance.Spikes have a tungsten carbide core for durability.To ensure that spikes are permanently fixed, tires should be run in for about 40km on asphalt while avoiding any fast acceleration or heavy braking.

        Sustainability
